entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -15.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -15.0°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 46 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -24.0°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
